data.title: Kelly Clarkson Sings 'Crazy On You' with Heart
data.meta_description: Kelly Clarkson was over the moon about getting to perform "Crazy on You" with Heart when the band appeared on 'The Kelly Clarkson Show.'
data.text:
Kelly Clarkson was over the moon about getting to perform “Crazy on You” with Heart when the band appeared on her talk show The Kelly Clarkson Show.

The truncated rendition of the tune can be seen below. Before the performance, Ann Wilson shared how “Crazy on You” was the first song she ever sang in a recording studio, which blew Clarkson’s mind.

Wilson noted, “I didn’t have a bunch of technique or anything yet, but I definitely felt how to say certain words, how to jump in early sometimes, how to ‘blue note’ things… just feel that kind of stuff.”

Heart, of course, recently kicked off their latest batch of tour dates, which run through out the rest of 2024. Their next show is tonight (April 25) in Hollywood, Fla. A full list of upcoming tour dates is below.

Erica Banas is a news blogger who's been covering the rock/classic rock world since 2014. The coolest event she's ever covered in person was the 2021 Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony. (Sir Paul McCartney inducting Foo Fighters? C'mon now!) She's also well-versed in etiquette and extraordinarily nice. #TransRightsAreHumanRights
